notes: mtl_transaction_accounts bridges inventory transactions to financial accounting in Oracle Inventory and Cost Management modules. Each record ties a material transaction (transaction_id) from mtl_material_transactions to its corresponding accounting entry. Key columns include reference_account (natural account segment), accounting_line_type (e.g., Inventory Valuation, COGS), base_transaction_value (functional currency amount), primary_quantity, inventory_item_id, organization_id, transaction_source_id, and transaction_date. It also tracks GL transfer statuses (gl_batch_id, gl_sl_link_id) and currency conversion details when applicable. The table ensures financial integrity between inventory movements and the General Ledger by providing full audit trails of valuation and expense posting.
